title: Spatial and temporal variability of fouling communities on oyster spat collectors at Inhaca Island Southern Mozambique: Exploring the influence on recruitment of the oysters Pinctada capensis and Saccostrea cucullata
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Mizeque Mafambissa, Mats Lindegarth, Adriano Macia
